bookTitle: St. Francis of Assisi: Passion, Poverty and the Man who Transformed the Catholic Church

questions.question: Where and in what year did the Franciscans have their first General Chapter meeting?
questions.correctAnswer: At St Mary of the Angels in 1217

questions.question: What was the outcome of the General Chapter meeting?
questions.correctAnswer: Francis decided to send the friars to all nations to establish provinces for the order
distractors: They voted to seek papal approval for their rule
They established a formal training program for new friars
They decided to build a central monastery
They chose leaders for each region of Italy
They agreed to focus only on serving in Italy

questions.question: Who is known for building large churches and shrines in Palestine to memorialize events from the Gospels?
Why did Francis believe the perfect way to live the Christian life was on pilgrimage?
questions.correctAnswer: Because the pilgrim would surrender identity, class and security - everyone was basically equal on pilgrimage
distractors: Because pilgrimage required complete trust in God's providence
Because pilgrimage meant following in Christ's footsteps literally
Because pilgrimage was a form of penance and purification
Because pilgrimage tested one's faith and commitment

questions.question: What symbols did pilgrims carry to signify where they were traveling?
distractors: To Holy Land: star of David

questions.question: What provided some protection to the pilgrims as they traveled?
What did pilgrims need to rely on since they traveled without money or belongings?
questions.correctAnswer: Alms, kindness of others, trust and hope in God's providence
distractors: The charity of monasteries along the way
Work they could do in exchange for food

questions.question: How was Jesus' life on earth like a pilgrimage?
questions.correctAnswer: He listened to the voice of his Father, He obeyed and he left his 'home' in heaven to be human on earth (incarnate)
distractors: He wandered the desert for forty days without food
He traveled constantly with no place to lay his head
He journeyed to Jerusalem to die on the cross
He visited the temple and synagogues as a pilgrim
He walked the Via Dolorosa carrying his cross

questions.question: Where did Francis want to make a pilgrimage and why?
questions.correctAnswer: Francis wanted to go to the Holy Land so that he could walk in the footsteps of Christ in the sacred places where Jesus walked
distractors: To Rome to receive the Pope's blessing in person
To Santiago de Compostela to honor Saint James
To Canterbury to visit the shrine of Saint Thomas Becket
To Mount Athos to join the Orthodox monks in prayer
To Lourdes to pray at the grotto of Mary
